title: Battle for Thrace
text:
Battle for Thrace or Thracian derby is the name of the <a href="local%20derby">local derby</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> match between the two most popular and successful football clubs in <a href="Northern%20Thrace">Thrace</a> region, Bulgaria: <a href="PFC%20Botev%20Plovdiv">PFC Botev Plovdiv</a> and <a href="PFC%20Beroe%20Stara%20Zagora">PFC Beroe Stara Zagora</a>.
<a href="First%20Professional%20Football%20League%20%28Bulgaria%29">Parva Liga</a> match statistics.
Head-to-head ranking in First League (1948–2020).
• Total: <a href="PFC%20Beroe%20Stara%20Zagora">Beroe Stara Zagora</a> with 18 higher finishes, <a href="PFC%20Botev%20Plovdiv">Botev Plovdiv</a> with 31 higher finishes (as of the end of the 2019–20 season).
Trophies.
<a href="PFC%20%20Botev%20Plovdiv">Botev Plovdiv</a> and <a href="PFC%20Beroe%20Stara%20Zagora">Beroe Stara Zagora</a> are the only Bulgarian clubs, which managed to win at least once all major Bulgarian club tournaments (<a href="Bulgarian%20Championship">Bulgarian Championship</a>, <a href="Bulgarian%20Cup">Bulgarian Cup</a>, <a href="Bulgarian%20Supercup">Bulgarian Supercup</a>) and <a href="%20Balkans%20Cup"> Balkans Cup</a>
Statistics.
Biggest wins.
Botev wins.
8:1 - 22 December 1986
6:0 - 17 November 1968
4:1 - 1 December 2018
4:1 - 12 December 1984
Beroe wins.
5:2 - 7 August 1999
3:0 - 21 September 1986 
3:0 - 26 April 2010
